snippet.title: Bugaboo Pocket - Official Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer | Wholesome Snack December 2023
snippet.description: Raise various bugs and study them in Bugaboo Pocket, an upcoming virtual pet game coming to Nintendo Switch and PC in 2024. Watch the trailer for Bugaboo Pocket to see bugs in hats, minigames, and more of what you can expect from this game, where you raise and release bugs to help Beetleback Ridge recover from a devastating fire. In Bugaboo Pocket, play as a research scientist living in a cabin with just your bugs and a penpal for company. Spoil them with pets, minigames, food, and furniture.
